Subject: Neo Beast Wars
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

    Aracnia wondered what happened to Kitkat. She was such a busy leader, 
with so many obligations. A moment alone with her was hard to find. Looking 
around she thought about Megatron, the council, and Predacon rule. If they 
did succeed....what was stopping them from breaking away completely from 
Cybertron? They could make a manufacturing headquarters, where new Predacons 
would be built and programed. The Predacons could pave over the useless trees 
and plants, and build magnificent cities. Not only Earth, but Mars and the 
Moon could be colonized too. A small Predacon empire could arise in 
prehistoric times, and by the time it reached normal time on Cybertron, they 
would be so far advanced they could easily destroy what little opposition 
still thirived there.
    Aracnia smiled, things really were going to change.

    Megatron looked to Hell Beast as he entered. The others had made it back, 
except for Nighteyes who was inside Kitkats ship. "And what happened to you? 
Did you find anything out?"
    "No, but Kitkat really wants you to join her council." He said, with a 
bit of malice in his voice.
    Megatron smiled. Like a roach he would never truly be destroyed, but 
thrive in some kind of adaptment. This was one of those times.
